articles.author: Stephen Holder
articles.title: Indianapolis Colts LB Darius Leonard wants to go by middle name Shaquille
articles.description: Colts linebacker Darius Leonard said he wants to be known by his middle name Shaquille. "I would love if y'all would try to call me Shaquille or 'D' or 'Maniac' and not Darius," Leonard said.
articles.content:
WESTFIELD, Ind. -- The name Darius Leonard has become synonymous with defensive playmaking in the NFL.
But the Indianapolis Colts All-Pro linebacker no longer wants to be referred to by that name.
… [+2132 chars]
